deploy.startCommand: . /opt/venv/bin/activate && python scripts/check_uploads.py && python scripts/run_migrations.py && (python scripts/create_initial_data.py || echo '⚠️  Initial data creation failed, continuing...') && gunicorn --worker-class gevent -w 1 --bind 0.0.0.0:$PORT --timeout 300 --keep-alive 5 --log-level info --access-logfile - --error-logfile - wsgi:app
